snippet.title: Toodles & Toddlers - Preview Trailer
snippet.description:
Toodles & Toddlers game for Windows PC on Steam
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1530240/Toodles__Toddlers/
 
Toodles & Toddlers is an action survival puzzle hybrid with physics transformation crafting and resource chains. Experiment to discover what is possible then use the tools you create to combat hostile creatures while coping with fear and hunger.
